meanings.sent1: She deliberately chose the red dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: He always walks deliberately to avoid tripping.

meanings.definition: In a careful and unhurried manner.
meanings.sent1: The old man deliberately crossed the street at a slow pace.
meanings.sent2: She spoke deliberately, choosing her words with care.
meanings.sent3: The turtle moved deliberately, taking its time to reach the pond.
meanings.sent4: The clouds drifted deliberately across the sky, as if in no rush.
meanings.sent5: The chef chopped the vegetables deliberately, savoring each movement.
